updates.text: [TEL] UPDATE: Fault has been cleared and train service is progressively resuming. No more additional travel time between Caldecott and Bayshore in both directions. We apologize for any inconvenience.
[TEL] UPDATE: Please allow for additional 10 mins travel time between Caldecott and Bayshore in both directions due to a train fault.
[TEL]: Please allow for additional 10 mins travelling time from Caldecott to Gardens by the Bay due to a train fault.
